# Race Results

For York River Yacht Club's 2015 Season

```{r}
library(ggforce)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)

race <- read.csv('../RaceData.csv')

p <- ggplot(race, aes(x = Rating, y = Points, color = Course))
p <- p + facet_wrap(~Fleet)
p <- p + stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot")
ggplotly(p)

```
